name: Journaling
description: Writing down thoughts and feelings to understand them more clearly and reduce stress.
frequency: Daily or several times a week
benefits: Improves emotional well-being, Reduces stress and anxiety, Enhances self-awareness

name: Regular Physical Exercise
description: Engaging in physical activities that you enjoy, such as walking, cycling, or yoga, to boost mood and reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety.
benefits: Boosts mood, Reduces anxiety and depression, Improves sleep quality
resources: Local fitness groups, Exercise apps and online programs
